plugins\/wescontrol\/plugin_info\/config.Tous les serveurs Wes sont à jour: All Wes servers are up to date

plugins\/wescontrol\/plugin_info\/config.Nous vous conseillons de basculer sur la: We advise you to switch to the beta version of the plugin for better compatibility with Wes firmware greater than or equal to V0.84A10
We advise you to switch to the stable version of the plugin for better compatibility with Wes firmwares lower than V0.84A10

plugins\/wescontrol\/desktop\/php\/wesco.Renseigner le mot de passe du compte pou: Enter the account password for FTP access. Allows the sending of the CGX file to the Wes server

plugins\/wescontrol\/desktop\/php\/wesco.Indiquer le type de mesure à relever: Indicate the type of measure to be recorded
plugins\/wescontrol\/desktop\/php\/wesco.Indiquer le type de compteur TIC utilisé: Indicate the type of TIC meter used in order to personalize the illustration image
plugins\/wescontrol\/desktop\/php\/wesco.Indiquer le type de pince utilisé afin d: Indicate the type of clamp used in order to personalize the illustrative image of the equipment

info.json.Prenez le contrôle de votre serveur d'én: Take control of your Cartelectronic Wes energy server from Jeedom and you will be able to increase its functionality tenfold. The plugin offers the possibility of using a CGX file specially designed for Jeedom and allowing to read more data than those available by default (requires access to the Wes server in FTP). The plugin in stable version offers full compatibility with Wes servers with firmware lower than V0.84A10 and the beta version with firmware higher or equal to V0.84A10
